Constructor & Destructor Documentation

TrafficLight::TrafficLight ( TrafficLight &  other  )  [private]

Disallow copying of traffic lights

TrafficLight::TrafficLight ( int  id,
float  greenTime,
float  yellowTime,
float  redTime,
float  initTime 
)

Creates a traffic light

Parameters:
id ID of the traffic light
greenTime number of seconds the light will stay green
yellowTime number of seconds the light will stay yellow
redTime number of seconds the light will stay red
initTime skip this number of seconds into the light change cycle, offsetting this light from the rest

TrafficLight::TrafficLight ( int  id,
bool  dummy 
)

Creates a dummy traffic light, useful as a placeholder. No transitions are scheduled for a dummy light

Parameters:
id ID of the traffic light
dummy true for always green or false for always red
